content: How can I generate a HTML page with two input boxes labeled "Name" and "Age" using AI?

You can use AI to generate HTML code with the desired input boxes by providing a clear prompt to an AI model capable of code generation. However, for simplicity, I can provide you with the HTML code directly: ```html Input Form

User Information





``` This HTML snippet creates a simple form with two input fields labeled "Name" and "Age." You can copy and paste this code into an HTML file, then open it in a web browser to see the form in action. If you want to use AI to generate such code, tools like GitHub Copilot or other AI code generation platforms can assist you with similar tasks by understanding your prompts and providing code suggestions.
